channel.title: Hosts of HugoCast on Microsoft Community Hub
channel.description: Recent content in Hosts of HugoCast on Microsoft Community Hub

item.title: Nicholas Chang
item.description: Nicholas is a Senior Platform Engineer working at Kainos interested in learning and sharing Azure Knowledge within the community. I work with Azure, Terraform, Azure DevOps, and GitHub and am passionate about Microsoft technology. You can find me on my Twitter: @nick_cloudops or visit my usergroup @ nicholaschangusergroup.com
